title: Track My Habit
description: Track My Habit is a clean, no-frills habit tracker for Chrome. Free and minimalistic, it helps you stay on track with your goals—whether it’s exercising more, reading daily, or building better routines. Inspired by Atomic Habits book. No account needed, no ads, and no distractions. Watching your streak grow is motivating—just ask my dad, who has a long streak in Duolingo! I hope it works for you too!
